fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Halve the majority required by half during the day (for that day). 1 Use.
- Check bounties during the day. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you halve the majority, anyone who exceeds the threshold will be immediately lynched, however the day will be extended afterwards until a (not halved) majority is reached to enter nightfall, or the normal time to end the day phase is reached.
- You will be immediately revealed as the Defamer after halving majority.
- When you check bounties, you will learn if any Insurgents are being voted for that day. You will not learn who specifically the Insurgent(s) is/are.
